Package se.martenb.iv1351.soundgood.integration

Class SchoolDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.martenb.iv1351.soundgood.integration.SchoolDAO
  • public class SchoolDAO
extends java.lang.Object
    Data access object (DAO) to responsible for handling all database calls in the Soundgood Music School application.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      SchoolDAO()
      Creates a database connected DAO.
